Running Junit 3.8.

I have an AllTests class that does not run after adding=
 a new suite.
Here is the top level AllTest code:

<snip>

public static Te=
st suite () throws Exception
{
TestSuite suite =3D new TestSuite("all power=
pick tests");
      
suite.addTest(com.rjmdental.powerpick.types.test.AllTe=
sts.suite());  
   suite.addTest(com.rjmdental.powerpick.input.test.AllTest=
s.suite());
//      
suite.addTest(com.rjmdental.powerpick.sequence.test.Al=
lTests.suite());
return suite;
}

</snip>

 my run changes from:
